description: This file defines the RecordsProvider class, a state management component for handling medical records within a Flutter application. It manages fetching and creating medical records via API calls, and notifies listeners of state changes.

classes.name: RecordsProvider
classes.description: A ChangeNotifier class that manages the list of medical records, including fetching and creating records, with API interactions and state updates.

methods.name: fetchRecords
methods.description: Fetches medical records from the API, with optional filtering by patient ID, limit, and skip count; updates internal records list and notifies listeners.

methods.name: createRecord
methods.description: Creates a new medical record via the API and refreshes the records list; returns true if successful, otherwise false.
